05-11.title: A NEW SENSE OF BELONGING
05-11.quote: Until we had talked with complete candor of our conflicts, and had listened to someone else do the same thing, we still didn't belong.
05-11.source: TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 57
content: After four years in A.A. I was able to discover the freedom from the burden of buried emotions that had caused me so much pain. With the help of A.A., and extra counseling, the pain was released and I felt a complete sense of belonging and peace. I also felt a joy and a love of God that I had never experienced before. I am in awe of the power of Step Five.
